pages.text: Wine Racks do work as Storage for Wine Bottles.$(br2)Stored Wine will also age when placed inside a Wine Rack.$(br2)Please note that not every Wine will fit into these Wine Racks due of their size

pages.title: How to use it
pages.text: Wine Bottles can be placed at any free slot.$(br2)Right-Click when holding a Wine Bottle to place it.$(br)Shift-Right-Click when having an empty Hand to take it out again.
